(self.webpackChunkiforex_en_2020=self.webpackChunkiforex_en_2020||[]).push([[791],{4901:()=>{!function(e){let i=!1,t=!1,a=!1,l=e(".video-wrapper"),s=e(".video-youtube"),o=[],r=[];if(l.length>0)for(var n=0;n<l.length;n++)o.push(e(l[n]).data("video-code"));if(s.length>0)for(n=0;n<s.length;n++)r.push(e(s[n]).data("src"));e(window).on("scroll resize",(()=>{i=!0})),function n(){i&&(!a&&l.length&&window.isInViewport(l)&&(o.length>0&&o.forEach((function(i){let t=e('.video-wrapper[data-video-code="'+i+'"]'),a='<div class="wistia_responsive_padding" style="padding:56.25% 0 0 0;position:relative;"><div class="wistia_responsive_wrapper" style="height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;"><iframe src="https://fast.wistia.net/embed/iframe/'+i+'?videoFoam=true" title="'+t.data("video-title")+'" allowtransparency="true" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" class="wistia_embed" name="wistia_embed" allowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen oallowfullscreen msallowfullscreen width="100%" height="100%"></iframe></div></div><script src="https://fast.wistia.net/assets/external/E-v1.js" async defer><\/script>';t.html(a)})),a=!0),!t&&s.length>0&&window.isInViewport(s)&&(r.length>0&&r.forEach((function(i){let t='<div class="video-wrapper"><iframe allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="315" src="'+i+'" width="100%"></iframe></div>';e('.video-youtube[data-src="'+i+'"]').html(t)})),t=!0)),window.setTimeout(n,250)}()}($)}},e=>{var i;i=4901,e(e.s=i)}]);
